Subject: Introducing Domnijoe and Blindchaos

:: Domnijoe and Blindchaos ::


A battered ship heads towards Earth, it's hull worn and patched in a 
feeble attempt to keep it together. It's engines barley work. If it 
wasn't for the two Decepticons hard work, the ship would have fallen 
apart a long time ago.
    Domnijoe was piloting, her temper foul.
    'Who couldn't you have picked a better piece of garbage?' she 
snapped, glaring at her companion. He was busily welding a tattered 
computer unit together. 
    'It was all I could find,' Blindchaos said, surprisingly 
unoffended. His cheerful grin grew wider to the dismay of the 
Cybertonian Jet.
    Domnijoe snorted, furious that she was stuck with an almost 
useless ship. They were lucky if it made it to Earth's moon in one 
piece.
    'Slaaaaaggg....what a stupid piece of.....' she muttered. She 
pushed herself away from the consol and set the ship to autopilot. Or 
what was left of it. She turned to Mindchaos, her red eyes 
smouldering. 
    She and Blindchaos had broken from one of the few gangs left on 
Cybertron. They planned to search for more Decepticons. It had been
an 
obsession of Domnijoe's since an alien mining vessel had aroused her 
from her stasis pod. She had been left for dead by her comrads and,
in 
her searches to find her breatheren, found Blindchaos. Domnijoe 
remembered when Decepticons occupied a small planet called Earth and 
hoped the original coordinates handn't erased in her memory. It felt 
like a long time ago, when Megatron had commanded the Earth-based 
troops. He was a lot better than the morons Domnijoe left behind on 
Cybertron. She was tired of the petty bickering on her home planet. 
    Thus the reason she dragged Blindchaos along. To look for Earth. 
They had stolen a ship, but were trailed and shot down. They took 
refuge in an old Maximal outpost until the threat had left. That had 
given Blindchaos time to uncover and repair an ailing scout ship.
That 
led them to their present situation. More than a dozen times they had 
stopped and welded the stupid thing together. The whole scam was 
irritating to Domnijoe. At least Earth wasn't far from here...maybe a 
day's flight. 
    "Stay together for one more lousy day, garbage heap." she said, 
smacking the consol. Part of it's frame loosened with a screach and 
fell to the floor with a clang. 
    Blindchaos looked up with a start.
    'Be gentle, deary." he said, returning to his work.
    "BE GENTLE???? I aught to trash this thing myself!!!" Domnijoe's 
scream echoed loudly in the near empty ship. Most of the metal plates 
they had brought had been used to patch holes.
    Blindchaos sighed in his typically good natured way. 
    "We're not going to make it to Earth if you insist on breaking 
things." he said. "Be Gentle."
    Domnijoe slapped her head. It was going to be a long flight....

************
Northlight
Domnijoe Productions
*************************************
